Package ss.pentago.network.protocol

Interface ProtocolHandler

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ClientProtocolHandler, ServerProtocolHandler
    public interface ProtocolHandler
    ProtocolHandler standardizes the communicates between clients and server and abstracts it away from specific Client or Server implementations.

        Parameters:

      • checkArgumentLengthMinMax

        default boolean checkArgumentLengthMinMax​(java.lang.String[] args,
                                          int min,
                                          int max)
        Check the length of the arguments. Calls sendError(String) when the length requirement is not met.
        Parameters:
        args - the arguments to check
        min - the minimum length
        max - the maximum length (exclusive)
        Returns:
        true when the length is within [min,max)

      • checkArgumentLengthMin

        default boolean checkArgumentLengthMin​(java.lang.String[] args,
                                       int min)
        Check the length of the arguments. Calls sendError(String) when the length requirement is not met.
        Parameters:
        args - the arguments to check
        min - the minimum length
        Returns:
        true when the length is at least the minimum

      • checkArgumentLengthExact

        default boolean checkArgumentLengthExact​(java.lang.String[] args,
                                         int length)
        Check the length of the arguments. Calls sendError(String) when the length requirement is not met.
        Parameters:
        args - the arguments to check
        length - the exact length required
        Returns:
        true when the length is exactly the same as length

      • printDebugMessageSent

        Parameters:
        message - the message

        Parameters:
        message - the message
